explains: n. 君主，女王；黑脉金斑蝶；王鹟
wordGroup: monarch butterfly 黑脉金斑蝶，王蝶

sentences.en: He had the ear of the monarch.
sentences.cn: 他在君主那里说得上话。

sentences.en: The greatest monarch on the proudest throne is obliged to sit upon his own arse.
sentences.cn: 最伟大的君主坐在最骄傲的宝座上，也不得不坐在自己的屁股上。

sentences.en: The matter, which was a weighty one, was like to go against the English monarch by default.
sentences.cn: 这一重大事件，在一般情况下，似乎是对英国君主不利的。
